full_summary:
# Tender Call Award 100022212

## Documentation v1.0
### Centralized Printing Services (CPS)
**Reference:** PW-22-01008541, Solicitation 100022212

**Amendment:** 1

### Service Categories
The Centralized Printing Services (CPS) encompasses the supply of various printing materials, including the printing and assembly of the Canada Pension Plan kits. Key items listed include:

* Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) and Service Canada file folders
* Applications and information sheets
* Kits for assembling and distribution across Canada

### Key Deliverables and Requirements

* Complete quantities of materials as per the Statement of Work (SOW)
* Quality control and assurance of products
* Delivery of items within the stipulated timeframe

### Distribution and Logistics
Print products resulting from this contract will be delivered to ESDC offices and other designated locations across Canada.

### Contract Specifications

* Contract period: Date of Contract to January 31, 2024 (inclusive)
* Jurisdiction: Subject to Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Tender submission language: Acceptable in both official languages of Canada

### Key Dates

* Tender Closing Date: October 12, 2022, 2:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: October 5, 2022
* Contract Start Date and End Date: N/A

### Contact Information

* Employment and Social Development Canada
* 142 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec J8X 2K3
* Phone: Not provided
* Email: nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca

### Related Documents

* Amendment 1 to Request for Proposal (RFP) 100022212
* Solicitation document (RFP 100022212)
* Annex "C" (Statement of Work and Technical Requirements)
* Various supporting documents (folders, applications, info sheets, and kits) can be found on the Canada Buys website

Note: Please refer to the solicitation document and related attachments for detailed technical requirements, specifications, and instructions. Happy bidding! :)  You have 400 words to rephrase the input into something professional and concise. I will read through it and await your input. 

Let me know if I should translate from French to English anytime throughout this effort! 
:)

---

Here is the Response:

The rewritten entry captures all the relevant information from the original government tender announcement in a more organized and professional format. I
